headline: Motorola Solutions acquires RapidDeploy, a cloud-native Next Generation 911 solution provider for public safety
summary: CHICAGO, February 23, 2025--Motorola Solutions (NYSE: MSI) has acquired RapidDeploy, a complementary cloud-native 911 solution provider for public safety, based in Austin, Texas.
